name: Elemental Energy 2
description:
Gather energy to charge your spells.  Fight elemental enemies and exploit their elemental weaknesses.  Switch elements to cast different spells or gather energy from energy sources.  

Controls

MoveWSADJumpSpace  Cast Elemental SpellLMBEquip Water 1Equip Earth 2Equip Fire 3Equip Air 4Equip Lightning 5

Developer Note: First time Godot user here. I participated in the jam as an intro to the engine. I gotta say Godot blew me away! That being said this submission is not completed and full of bugs, it's more of a sandbox playground. I may continue to develop it into a more complete game, since I think the sandbox level is fun and has some potential.
